title: Never Seen
description: YA supernatural thriller.How far would you go... to save the ones you love?Kelly knows something is wrong in her house, is it a haunting? Her mother knows more than she's telling her. Jason is acting weirder than ever. Kelly investigates, she thinks it's ghosts. Or is it something much worse? They are after her family. They want them all dead. Why? What will Kelly have to do to save her family?
author: Matthew Leeth
